name: Tamer Hosny
description: '''Tamer Hosny Sherif Abbas Farghaly''' ({{langx|ar|تامر حسني شريف عباس فرغلي}}; born 16 August 1977), known by his stage name '''Tamer Hosny''' ({{langx|ar|تامر حسني}}), is an Egyptian actor who first came to attention as a singer when he appeared on mixed tapes with other Egyptian artists. Hosny launched his solo career with his 2004 album ''Hob'', becoming a successful singer of romantic music and was given the nickname "Star of the Generation" by his fans.
